title: Hot Wheels Unleashed
description: An incredibly fun, fast paced racing game filled to the brim with a variety of cars, all based on their toy counterparts. To say that graphics in this game are realistic is an understatement. Each part of the model reflects even the materials that the original toy is made from. Combine that with fun gameplay on various tracks inspired by real life buildings, you get an amazing racing experience that will bring you back to the good old days of your childhood.
shrtdescription: An incredibly fun, fast paced racing game.
platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X and Series S, Microsoft Windows, Xbox One, PlayStation 5

title: Subnautica
description: Subnautica is an amazing game that allows you to dive deep into the abyss of an ocean on a faraway planet. Amazing atmosphere combined with various dangers that lurk in the depths of the ocean make it both a scary and an exciting experience. Game has developed to be better and better over the years and now it has more content than ever before. I can definitely recommend diving into this one.
shrtdescription: Subnautica is an amazing game that allows you to dive deep into the abyss of an ocean on a faraway planet.
platforms: PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, PlayStation 5

title: Among Us
description: A fun social deduction game where you get to experience true distrust and uncertainty. While it is fun to play it online, where it really shines is playing with friends. Even though the game has no voice chat feature, it can easily be replaced with outside communicators when playing with people you know. Overall it’s a solid experience that despite low price will last for many hours of fun. Recommended.
shrtdescription: A fun social deduction game where you get to experience true distrust and uncertainty.
platforms: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S

title: Crash Bandicoot™ 4: It’s About Time
description: A sequel to an old and beloved franchise. While the game can offer plenty of fun platforming, in a way it feels like it lacks its own identity. It’s hard to say much about the target audience, as it tries to appeal both to old and new fans and misses the mark in both cases.
shrtdescription: A sequel to an old and beloved franchise.
platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and Series S, Microsoft Windows

title: Bugsnax
description: Bugsnax is a fun game where you get to explore an island and collect bug-snacks. There is plenty to see and gather all around the world. While the target audience of the game is most certainly younger folks, a person of any age can have much fun with it.
shrtdescription: Bugsnax is a fun game where you get to explore an island and collect bug-snacks.
platforms: PlayStation 4, Microsoft Windows, macOS, PlayStation 5, Macintosh operating systems

title: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl
description: A fun fighting game that features a ton of well known characters. The title says it all, (almost) all the stars are in. Fight your friends in many varied stages from all across different nickelodeon IPs. If you have friends, this game is for you, it’s all about multiplayer.
shrtdescription: A fun fighting game that features a ton of well known characters.
platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X and Series S, Microsoft Windows, Xbox One, PlayStation 5

title: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
description: Another blast from the past, an older beloved franchise is back with more content. This title is particularly impressive, as it shows the true power of the PS5 by fully utilizing all the functions of the DualSense controller. Definitely a must play for everyone that owns the console.
shrtdescription: Another blast from the past, an older beloved franchise is back with more content.

title: Farming Simulator 22
description: The title says it all. Experience farm life and develop your farm in this incredible and realistic simulator. Guaranteed hours of fun and tons of things to do. From growing crops to buying new awesome machines of mass production. This game has it all.
shrtdescription: Experience farm life and develop your farm in this incredible and realistic simulator.
platforms: PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PC, Stadia, and Mac OS

title: My Friend Peppa Pig
description: Perfect product for rising a young gamer. This might just be the peak of child-friendly gaming. This masterpiece allows us to create our own character, which is already much more than we can expect from the selection of modern games. Beyond various customization options, we finally get to the gameplay that makes up both the soul and the body of the game. The ability to experience the classic and wonderful show Peppa Pig and even take part in it is unbelievable. Game allows us to explore various locations that could be seen in the show, and play many minigames in them. All is surrounded by graphics closely reminiscent of the show. Not just that, game also has build-in parental controls that allow you to set a time limit, so you don’t end up lost in this masterpiece for too long.Much like some of the best RPGs of our time, we take a part of an incredible story and experience it the way we want it- with our own character. Definitely can recommend, this is more than just a game.
shrtdescription: This might just be the peak of child-friendly gaming.
platforms: PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and Steam

title: Sackboy: A Big Adventure
description: Yet another cult classic in a brand-new release. This game is sure to provide you with an exciting platforming challenge across many diverse worlds filled to the brim with unique enemies. Don’t forget to bring your friends, because the entire campaign can be finished in local co-op, it even has some multiplayer exclusive levels!
shrtdescription: Yet another cult classic in a brand-new release.
